刀.definition: knife; blade; single-edged sword; cutlass; CL:把[ba3]; (slang) dollar (loanword); classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper); classifier for knife cuts or stabs

刀不磨要生銹，人不學要落後.pinyin: dāo bù mó yào shēng xiù ， rén bù xué yào luò hòu
刀不磨要生銹，人不學要落後.definition: (proverb) a blade will get rusty if it is not sharpened; a man will fall behind if he doesn't study

刀光劍影.definition: lit. flash of knives and swords (idiom); fig. intense conflict

刀削麵.definition: knife-shaved noodles (pared or shaved into strips), a Shanxi specialty

刀口.definition: the edge of a knife; cut; incision

刀塔.definition: Defense of the Ancients (DotA), video game

刀子嘴巴，豆腐心.pinyin: dāo zi zuǐ bā ， dòu fǔ xīn
刀子嘴巴，豆腐心.definition: lit. knife mouth but heart of bean curd; sharp tongue concealing a caring heart

刀子嘴，豆腐心.pinyin: dāo zi zuǐ ， dòu fǔ xīn
刀子嘴，豆腐心.definition: to have a sharp tongue but a soft heart (idiom)

刀山火海.definition: lit. mountains of daggers and seas of flames; fig. extreme danger (idiom)

刀槍不入.definition: lit. impervious to sword or spear (idiom); fig. invulnerable; untouchable; thick-skinned; impervious to criticism

刀槍劍戟.definition: (idiom) melee combat weapons of ancient China, such as swords, spears and halberds

刀筆.definition: writing up of official or judicial documents; pettifoggery

刀郎.definition: Dolan, a people of the Tarim Basin, Xinjiang, also known as 多郎

刀鋒.definition: cutting edge or point of a knife, sword or tool

刀鋸斧鉞.definition: knife, saw, ax and hatchet (idiom); facing torture and execution

刀鋸鼎鑊.definition: knife, saw and cauldron; ancient instruments of torture; fig. torture

刀馬旦.definition: female warrior role in Chinese opera

刀魚.definition: tapertail anchovy (Coilia ectenes); various species of cutlassfish; saury
